insights.lesson: Reasonable detail for MVP task.

lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 这个 MVP 任务的细节粒度基本合理。

insights.lesson: **MONAD DeFi ALLOCATION STRATEGY** *Investment Brief | Pre-Mainnet Positioning* **Current Status** Monad mainnet deployment scheduled Q4 2024–Q1 2025. Network currently in advanced testnet phase (EVM-
Do not run automated token scans on pre-launch protocols; manually verify team credentials and audit reports until contracts deploy.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Do not run automated token scans on pre-launch protocols; manually verify team credentials and audit reports until contracts deploy.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 对尚未正式上线的协议不要做自动化代币扫描；在合约部署前应人工核验团队背景和审计报告。

insights.lesson: Verify mainnet is live before researching yields; pre-launch chains lack real TVL and only offer speculative point accrual.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Verify mainnet is live before researching yields; pre-launch chains lack real TVL and only offer speculative point accrual.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 研究收益前先确认主网已上线；预发布链没有真实 TVL，只提供投机性的积分积累。

insights.lesson: Reject any contracts claiming Monad mainnet deployment until Q2 2025 launch; verify all tokens are testnet-only to avoid scams.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Reject any contracts claiming Monad mainnet deployment until Q2 2025 launch; verify all tokens are testnet-only to avoid scams.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 在 Monad 主网 Q2 2025 正式上线前，应拒绝相信任何声称已主网上线的合约；确认所有代币仍是测试网资产以规避诈骗。

insights.lesson: Always confirm mainnet status before DeFi yield research; pre-launch networks have zero real TVL and offer only non-liquid testnet incentives.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Always confirm mainnet status before DeFi yield research; pre-launch networks have zero real TVL and offer only non-liquid testnet incentives.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 做 DeFi 收益研究前务必确认主网是否已上线；预发布网络没有真实 TVL，只提供不可流通的测试网激励。

insights.lesson: Implement optimistic parallel execution with dynamic dependency resolution to eliminate sequential bottlenecks and achieve sub-second latency for AI agent coordination.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Implement optimistic parallel execution with dynamic dependency resolution to eliminate sequential bottlenecks and achieve sub-second latency for AI agent coordination.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 通过动态依赖解析实现乐观并行执行，消除串行瓶颈，把 AI Agent 协同延迟压到秒级以内。

insights.lesson: Implement optimistic parallel execution to eliminate sequential bottlenecks and enable real-time AI inference for on-chain autonomous agents.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Implement optimistic parallel execution to eliminate sequential bottlenecks and enable real-time AI inference for on-chain autonomous agents.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 实现乐观并行执行，消除串行瓶颈，让链上自治 Agent 支持实时 AI 推理。

insights.lesson: **Monad DeFi Portfolio Allocation Framework: Early-Stage Risk Management** ### Market Context & Constraints Monad mainnet (Q1 2025) exhibits classic launch economics: emission-driven APYs (50-400%) ar
Avoid protocols with EOA proxy admins and un-timelocked validator sets; owner-controlled instant upgrades enable immediate stake drainage.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Avoid protocols with EOA proxy admins and un-timelocked validator sets; owner-controlled instant upgrades enable immediate stake drainage.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 避免选择由 EOA 控制代理管理员且验证者集合没有 timelock 的协议；所有者可即时升级时，质押资产可能被立即抽走。

insights.lesson: Avoid large positions in sub-$10M Monad pools due to slippage, and treat 50-400% APYs as temporary incentives with elevated smart contract risk.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Avoid large positions in sub-$10M Monad pools due to slippage, and treat 50-400% APYs as temporary incentives with elevated smart contract risk.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 避免在 TVL 低于 1000 万美元的 Monad 池子里重仓；50-400% 的 APY 只应视作临时激励，并伴随更高的合约风险。

insights.lesson: Quantify how parallel execution reduces AI agent latency and compute costs to make throughput advantages economically concrete.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Quantify how parallel execution reduces AI agent latency and compute costs to make throughput advantages economically concrete.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 量化并行执行如何降低 AI Agent 延迟与计算成本，让吞吐优势在经济上更具体。

insights.lesson: **Lesson:** Always require contract addresses or source code upfront; without inputs, security tools return null results, leaving critical vulnerabilities undetected and delaying risk mitigation. ---
Validate contract address or source code exists before executing gas optimization analysis.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Validate contract address or source code exists before executing gas optimization analysis.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 执行 gas 优化分析前先确认合约地址或源码已提供。

insights.lesson: Provide contract address or bytecode before scanning; empty input yields zero signal.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Provide contract address or bytecode before scanning; empty input yields zero signal.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 扫描前先提供合约地址或字节码；空输入不会产生有效信号。

insights.lesson: Never submit empty vulnerability arrays; comprehensive audits require detailed line-by-line analysis with severity ratings for every checked security pattern.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Never submit empty vulnerability arrays; comprehensive audits require detailed line-by-line analysis with severity ratings for every checked security pattern.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 不要提交空漏洞数组；完整审计需要对每个检查项给出逐行分析和严重级别。

insights.lesson: **TOKEN SECURITY AUDIT REPORT TEMPLATE** **Document Control** - **Project:** [TOKEN_NAME / TICKER] - **Contract Address:** [0x... on Monad Network] - **Audit Date:** [YYYY-MM-DD] - **Auditor:** [NAME/
Provide contract source code or deployment address to enable gas optimization analysis and storage packing recommendations.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Provide contract source code or deployment address to enable gas optimization analysis and storage packing recommendations.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 提供合约源码或部署地址，才能进行 gas 优化分析和存储打包建议。

insights.lesson: Always provide the contract address or source code before requesting a scan; token security analysis cannot proceed without target bytecode.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Always provide the contract address or source code before requesting a scan; token security analysis cannot proceed without target bytecode.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 发起扫描前必须提供合约地址或源码；没有目标字节码就无法进行代币安全分析。

insights.lesson: Never return empty vulnerability arrays without verified inputs; always request contract code or address when absent.

lessonTranslations.en-US: Never return empty vulnerability arrays without verified inputs; always request contract code or address when absent.
lessonTranslations.zh-CN: 在未验证输入的情况下不要返回空漏洞数组；缺少信息时应先索取合约代码或地址。
